parameters.name: Cookie
parameters.description: Identifier of toolbar; this is the same Cookie you specified in ISwAddin::ConnectToSW

parameters.name: ToolbarId
parameters.description: ID of the toolbar as defined in swToolbar_e

title: ISldWorks.HideToolbar2
description: Hides a toolbar created with ISldWorks::AddToolbar5.
signature:
System.Boolean HideToolbar2( 
   System.Int32
Cookie
,
   System.Int32
ToolbarId
)

parameters.name: Cookie
parameters.description: Identifier of toolbar; this is the same Cookie you specified in ISwAddin::ConnectToSW

parameters.name: ToolbarId
parameters.description: ID of the toolbar as defined in swToolbar_e

returns: True if toolbar is hidden, false if not
remarks:
For information about using this method with the
ISwAddin
object, see
Using ISwAddin to Create a SOLIDWORKS Add-in
.
